entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Hearst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:35 a.m. EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain except periods of snow over western sections this afternoon. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this morning. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow except rain over eastern sections. Amount 5 cm over western sections. Wind north 20 km/h. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Rain over eastern sections early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High 12. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
